Is this citation correct? MS stamped: 'COLONIAL SECRETARY'S OFFICE | PERTH W.A. | 345/12 | 20 NOV. 79'. [20 November 1879]
Memorandum for the consideration of His Excellency the Governor.

I beg to forward to your Excellency a Report by Sir F. von Mueller on the plants of the Nichol Bay District,
B81.03.02. which was written on my solicitation, upon the plants collected by myself & party when surveying the District last year.
It was my intention to have had this report printed as an appendix to my report on the District, but Your Excellency was unable to sanction the printing at that time and nothing has been done since.

As I feel personally rather ashamed of having put my friend Baron Mueller to the trouble of writing this valuable essay & not utilizing it, I hope Your Excellency may now be able to sanction its publication, either in the form of a Council paper or in a small pamphlet, as my recent letters from the Baron give me the impression that he is very anxious for its appearance & seems hurt at the delay.
